function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Survival of SARS-CoV-2 on different surfaces, indicating potential for fomite transmission","Impact":"Increased risk of fomite transmission and surface contamination","Mitigation":"Regular cleaning and disinfection of surfaces, proper hand hygiene","Technologies":"Advanced disinfection technologies, air filtration systems","People":"General public, occupant of indoor spaces","Owner":"Facility management, cleaning staff, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Potential transmission of SARS-CoV-2 through fecal-oral pathway","Impact":"Increased risk of transmission through fecal-oral route","Mitigation":"Proper sanitation and hygiene practices, safe disposal of waste","Technologies":"Sanitation systems, waste management technologies","People":"General public, sanitation workers","Owner":"Public health authorities, sanitation departments, waste management agencies"},{"Description":"Possibility of SARS-CoV-2 transmission through aerosols","Impact":"Increased risk of aerosol transmission in indoor spaces","Mitigation":"Air quality monitoring, ventilation improvement, use of face masks","Technologies":"Air purifiers, HVAC systems, particle filtration systems","People":"Occupants of indoor spaces, healthcare workers","Owner":"Building management, employers, public health authorities"}]}
